intent_atoms.description: Migrate metadata display patterns across the ISOInspector UI to use the FoundationUI DS.KeyValueRow component via a new BoxMetadataRow wrapper that supports label, value, and optional copyable action.
Audit all current metadata display patterns for row heights, spacing, font sizes, colors.
Create BoxMetadataRow wrapper around DS.KeyValueRow with support for label, value, optional copyable action, inheriting dark mode adaptation and matching accessibility pattern from I1.1 and I1.2.
Refactor all metadata field displays to use BoxMetadataRow across ISO box metadata, parse results, issue summaries, codec/track info, file header details.
Unit tests for BoxMetadataRow component with ≥90% coverage.
Snapshot tests validating layout, colors, dark mode adaptation.
Accessibility tests confirming WCAG 2.1 AA compliance (≥98% score).
Integration tests with copyable action behavior.
Regression tests ensuring existing metadata displays still function correctly.
Add BoxMetadataRow to ComponentTestApp showcase screen.
Update Design System Guide with migration patterns.
Test coverage remains ≥80% across affected targets.
FoundationUI components automatically handle dark mode; BoxMetadataRow must inherit this behavior via environment modifiers.
Copyable action pattern must provide visual/haptic feedback on successful copy and work on iOS, iPadOS, macOS.
BoxMetadataRow will be a wrapper around DS.KeyValueRow exposing label, value, optional CopyableAction configuration and conditional display of copy button.

functional_units.name: BoxMetadataRow Component
functional_units.description: A reusable UI component that wraps FoundationUI's DS.KeyValueRow to display a label and value pair with optional copy-to-clipboard action, supporting dark mode and accessibility.

functional_units.name: Metadata Display Refactor
functional_units.description: System-wide migration of all metadata field displays (box metadata, parse results, codec/track info, file header details) to use the BoxMetadataRow component.

functional_units.name: Copyable Action Integration
functional_units.description: Implementation of copy-to-clipboard functionality for metadata values, including visual/haptic feedback and integration with existing CopyableAction patterns.

functional_units.name: Unit Test Suite for BoxMetadataRow
functional_units.description: Automated tests ensuring component behavior, state handling, and 90%+ code coverage.

functional_units.name: Snapshot Testing for Layout & Dark Mode
functional_units.description: Visual regression tests comparing rendered layouts, colors, and dark mode adaptation against approved baselines.

functional_units.name: Accessibility Compliance Tests
functional_units.description: Tests verifying WCAG 2.1 AA compliance with ≥98% score, covering VoiceOver labels and Dynamic Type support.

functional_units.name: Integration Tests for Copyable Behavior
functional_units.description: Simulated user interaction tests confirming copy action works across iOS, iPadOS, and macOS platforms.

functional_units.name: Regression Test Suite
functional_units.description: Tests ensuring existing metadata displays continue to function correctly after migration.

functional_units.name: ComponentTestApp Showcase Screen
functional_units.description: A screen in ComponentTestApp that demonstrates the BoxMetadataRow component in use.

functional_units.name: Design System Guide Update
functional_units.description: Documentation updates describing migration patterns, usage guidelines, and design tokens for BoxMetadataRow.
